dcterms:description: The DTU dataset is widely used for evaluating multi-view stereo methods, containing images from various scenes with known camera intrinsics and poses, allowing for comprehensive performance assessments in sparse view settings.
dcterms:title: DTU

dcterms:description: BlendedMVS is a large-scale dataset designed for generalized multi-view stereo networks, providing a diverse set of scenes to evaluate the performance of reconstruction methods under various conditions.
dcterms:title: BlendedMVS
